name: Fish or Chips
description:
Fish or Chips is a project envisioned by students of the Filmakademie Baden-Württemberg's Animationsinstitut. It consists of the creation of an entire IP as well as two projects derived from it:
A short animated movie as well as an interactive experience.

Because the pandemic made our chances of presenting an animated movie to a live audience very slim, we decided on an alternative format. Over the course of a month the two Seagulls Maude & Sully posted their view of the pandemic on an Instagram page and showed the viewers how they survived without any humans around!

The IP on Instagram:

Feel free to check out the Fish or Chips Instagram and find out how Maude & Sully managed to overcome the hurdles of a pandemic together!
